title: 820-00928 ( Bad Touch ID button ) will apple help?
message:
I have a 820-00298 that has a bad Touch ID button.  It was preventing 20v on the charger!  After disconnecting it the machine boots!
Problem is how do I replace it?  Will apple fix it?  Maybe if I disconnect it and give it to them they will replace it.  I am sure when they connect it they will find out it keeps the machine from booting.  What can I do?

Check out my YouTube video to see the details.

[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WgLGLAVSlHQ[/url]

title: 820-00928 ( Bad Touch ID button ) will apple help?
message:
I wanted to post a update on this repair.  I decided to soak the touch ID button in a Zinc Choride solution for about 10 minutes the power wash it out with a water pick.  That did the trick.  I was able to save the Touch ID button and the machine works.  I posted multiple videos on this as I was repairing the machine on my channel.  

Want to thank who ever made Rubyfluid.  it is amazing stuff.
